mapper.select: SELECT restaurants.*, users.nickname FROM restaurants JOIN users WHERE restaurants.users_id = users.id ORDER BY restaurants.id DESC
SELECT restaurants.*, users.nickname FROM restaurants JOIN users WHERE restaurants.id=#{id} AND restaurants.users_id = users.id
SELECT c.*, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM restaurant_comments cc WHERE cc.restaurants_id = c.id) AS comment_count FROM restaurants c WHERE c.users_id = #{usersId} ORDER BY c.update_date DESC

SELECT c.*, u.nickname, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM restaurant_comments cc WHERE cc.restaurants_id = c.id) AS comment_count, (SELECT cp.file_path FROM restaurant_photos cp WHERE cp.restaurants_id = c.id ORDER BY cp.id ASC LIMIT 1) AS imageUrl, c.views AS views FROM restaurants c JOIN users u ON c.users_id = u.id WHERE c.title REGEXP #{pattern} OR c.content REGEXP #{pattern} ORDER BY c.id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO restaurants (name, mountain_name, location, rate, title, content, update_date, users_id, mountains_id) VALUES (#{name}, #{mountainName}, #{location}, #{rate}, #{title}, #{content}, #{updateDate}, #{usersId}, #{mountainsId})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM restaurants WHERE id=#{id} AND users_id = #{usersId}
